title: Sir John Major – 2021 Statement on Foreign Aid Cuts
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Sir John Major, the Prime Minister from 1990 to 1997, on 13 July 2021.
content:
The Government has blatantly broken its word, and should be ashamed of its decision.
